name: Waifu Defense (LolisMeW, JakeSoh)
description:
Waifu Defense is an online co-op tower defense strategy game that can be played with 4 friends (ideally) to defend against the waves of encroaching monsters.

Controls:

1. Key W, A, S, D - Move (Hold Left Shift to Sprint)

2. Space - Jump

3. LMB - Shoot

4. RMB - Aim

5. Key R - Reload

6. Key 1, 2, 3, 4 - Switch Weapon

7. Key V - Switch cam view tps/fps
